selected_repository_ids.description: An array of repository ids for which a codespace can access the secret. You can manage the list of selected repositories using the [List selected repositories for a user secret](https://docs.github.com/rest/codespaces/secrets#list-selected-repositories-for-a-user-secret), [Add a selected repository to a user secret](https://docs.github.com/rest/codespaces/secrets#add-a-selected-repository-to-a-user-secret), and [Remove a selected repository from a user secret](https://docs.github.com/rest/codespaces/secrets#remove-a-selected-repository-from-a-user-secret) endpoints.
